meta.job_title: Travel Nurse RN ED - Emergency Department

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care and treatment in the Emergency Department.
Assess and document patient conditions, and collaborate with healthcare team members.
Administer medication and treatment per physician orders.
Respond to medical emergencies and provide critical care as needed.
Utilize nursing documentation and maintain accurate records.
Participate in continuous education and training to maintain certifications and skills.
